scripts.build: bun build ./src/plans/scenario-plan.ts --outfile ./dist/plans/scenario-plan.js --external zod --external @gooi/guard-contracts/plans/guard-plan && bun build ./src/envelopes/scenario-envelopes.ts --outfile ./dist/envelopes/scenario-envelopes.js --external zod --external @gooi/scenario-contracts/errors/scenario-errors --external @gooi/scenario-contracts/plans/scenario-plan && bun build ./src/reports/scenario-reports.ts --outfile ./dist/reports/scenario-reports.js --external zod --external @gooi/scenario-contracts/envelopes/scenario-envelopes && bun build ./src/errors/scenario-errors.ts --outfile ./dist/errors/scenario-errors.js --external zod --external @gooi/scenario-contracts/plans/scenario-plan
